article: It's Saturday morning. Kate is having her  _  . Kate's mother and father are with her.  _  Saturday morning Kate  doesn't go  to school She helps her mother and father  do some housework  . This morning she says to her mother with a smile. "  _  I help you, Mum?""Yes, you can help  _  , Kate,"her mother says,"You can go to Mr Green's shop. Something is wrong  _  our clock." "It is in his shop. Is he  _  our clock?"Kate asks."Yes."her father says."And this morning it is ready.""Yes, it's ready,"her mother says,"Go to Mr Green's shop, Kate. Take this bag, you can  put  the clock in the bag."Kate takes the bag. She goes to the shop and gets the clock  home  .
